snippet: Chris Capuano threw seven shutout innings and drove in two runs as Los Angeles defeated the host Cubs.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Los Angeles Dodgers defeat Chicago Cubs, 5-1; Dodgers pitcher Chris Capuano gives stellar performance; other results noted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Capuano threw seven shutout innings and drove in two runs as Los Angeles defeated the host Cubs.

headline.seo: Capuano’s Hitting and Pitching Lead Dodgers to Win
headline.main: Capuano Lifts Dodgers on Mound and at Bat
headline.print_headline: Capuano Lifts Dodgers On Mound And at Bat
